page.title: 06Housing.
page.content: Many houses are close to open countryside. One parent has a freshwater stream running through his garden. Most houses are near to the two major parks; Cheetham's and Stamford. The Library, ?Art Gallery, and town shopping facilities are within walking distance. Good bus services mean people can travel easily from their homes. The railway station is within walking distance of most homes. Some people think there should be more facilities for childrens' play, especially for ball games in the housing areas. Some avenues and grass verges are in a generally intidy and dirty condition. Not everybody shows pride in their surroundings by keeping their gardens and paths tidy. There is sometimes a lot of litter lying about.
